findings.title: Initialize Join
findings.description: The pool owner must call initialize_join for all mints to create treasuries and deposit initial tokens into the pool.

findings.title: Incorrect GROUP_ACCOUNTS for close_pool instruction
findings.description: The value of GROUP_ACCOUNTS is incorrect, it should be 3 instead of 2, which may cause incorrect account indices to access the remaining_accounts array, leading to reverted when closing the pool.
